snippet: Marta Benitez, 95, says she considers herself lucky, despite the loss of her husband and only daughter to cancer.
abstract: Catholic Charities Archdiocese of New York, one of seven organizations supported by The New York Times Neediest Cases Fund, helps Marta Benitez of Upper Manhattan buy portable heater.
lead_paragraph: Marta Benitez, 95, says she considers herself lucky, despite the loss of her husband and only daughter to cancer.

headline.print_headline: Driven by Routine After 85 Years in East Harlem
headline.main: After 85 Years in East Harlem, a Routine That Keeps Her Going
